content: We believe our revenue guidance demonstrates the company is off to a good start in 2023, especially when you consider that it's an off year of the political cycle, and we are facing, we anticipate about $6 million of net revenue from the broadcast of the Super Bowl on our 27 Fox channels, but that's compared to an aggregate of $13 million of net revenue relating to the broadcast of the Winter Olympics and the Super Bowl on our 56 NBC channels during Q1 2022.
